short_description_localized.en: Measuring 970 square feet, the Metropolitan Suite features Manhattan residential style with high ceilings, and furnishings in rich golds and royal blues. The suite is located on the 8th floor.
short_description_localized.es: Measuring 970 square feet, the Metropolitan Suite features Manhattan residential style with high ceilings, and furnishings in rich golds and royal blues. The suite is located on the 8th floor.

description_localized.en: Measuring 970 square feet, this suite evokes an ambiance of a classic Manhattan residence with high ceilings, furnished with a palette of rich golds and royal blues. The Metropolitan Suite is located on the 8th floor.
